blog.name: ao3feed-jonrya
blog.title: AO3feed-Jonrya
blog.description: An automated feed for Jon x Arya fics posted on AO3.

summary: that secret that you know (but you don't know how to tell)
title: that secret that you know (but you don't know how to tell)
description:
by longhairandbarefeet

“Did you like it?” Jon asks anxiously. He’s turning the knob down on the radio, and is biting at the skin on his chapped lips, it’s a nervous habit of his to do, but it’s a bad habit of hers to wish he’d do that to her mouth instead. The thought of him reaching over, kissing her, and pushing his teeth into the skin of her bottom lip causes warmth to spread in her body like fire in her veins, a much-accepted feeling in the middle of the night, in the middle of December, and in a car without heat.

aka

a modern jon and arya au

tags: but hey what do i know
i'm just a stupid jonsa shipper
just ignore me and my crazy ramblings because this story is obviously headed for a happily ever after with no twists whatsoever
summary: I know this has been discussed at length already but...gosh isn't it just so strange how after the Battle of Castle Black,...
body: I know this has been discussed at length already but…gosh isn’t it just so strange how after the Battle of Castle Black, Tormund says to Jon, “You spent too much time with us Jon Snow. You’ll never be a kneeler again.” And then we just…never see him kneel after that…but of course he gives his word which as we all know, Jon Snow—the boy that parallels Ned Stark, who just so happens to be the one man in this entire story who pulled off the greatest con there ever was—could never lie or be dishonorable in any way ever. It’s odd though, isn’t it?

reblog.comment: I know this has been discussed at length already but…gosh isn’t it just so strange how after the Battle of Castle Black, Tormund says to Jon, “You spent too much time with us Jon Snow. You’ll never be a kneeler again.” And then we just…never see him kneel after that…but of course he gives his word which as we all know, Jon Snow—the boy that parallels Ned Stark, who just so happens to be the one man in this entire story who pulled off the greatest con there ever was—could never lie or be dishonorable in any way ever. It’s odd though, isn’t it?

You’ll never be a kneeler again.” And then we just…never see him kneel after that…but of course he gives his word which as we all know, Jon Snow—the boy that parallels Ned Stark, who just so happens to be the one man in this entire story who pulled off the greatest con there ever was—could never lie or be dishonorable in any way ever. It’s odd though, isn’t it?
trail.content: I know this has been discussed at length already but…gosh isn’t it just so strange how after the Battle of Castle Black, Tormund says to Jon, “You spent too much time with us Jon Snow. You’ll never be a kneeler again.” And then we just…never see him kneel after that…but of course he gives his word which as we all know, Jon Snow—the boy that parallels Ned Stark, who just so happens to be the one man in this entire story who pulled off the greatest con there ever was—could never lie or be dishonorable in any way ever. It’s odd though, isn’t it?

summary: "He's to marry Arya Stark. My little sister." Jon could almost see her in that moment, long-faced and gawky, all knobby knees...
body:
“He’s to marry Arya Stark. My little sister.” Jon could almost see her in that moment, long-faced and gawky, all knobby knees and sharp elbows, with her dirty face and tangled hair. […] His fingers closed around the parchment. Would that they could crush Ramsay Bolton’s throat as easily.

Gendry was at his forge, bare-chested beneath his leather apron. He was beating on a sword as if he wished it were a foe, his sweat-soaked hair falling across his brow.

its unclear what exactly gendry believes happened to arya but if he does think she was sold to the boltons then the parallels between him and jon at this point are even stronger. both of arya’s bastard boys are devastated by this news and want to kill the man arya allegedly married. their mundane actions (crushing a letter, working on a sword) are likened to violent acts against explicitly in jons case - ramsay. its left ambiguous in gendrys since he’s no pov but i think its safe to assume his imagined foe is whoever he believes hurt arya

reblog.comment:

Gendry was at his forge, bare-chested beneath his leather apron. He was beating on a sword as if he wished it were a foe, his sweat-soaked hair falling across his brow.

its unclear what exactly gendry believes happened to arya but if he does think she was sold to the boltons then the parallels between him and jon at this point are even stronger. both of arya’s bastard boys are devastated by this news and want to kill the man arya allegedly married. their mundane actions (crushing a letter, working on a sword) are likened to violent acts against explicitly in jons case - ramsay. its left ambiguous in gendrys since he’s no pov but i think its safe to assume his imagined foe is whoever he believes hurt arya

summary: So.... am I the only one who thought that the Dothraki would make Daenerys eat another stallion heart if she got pregnant again?...
caption:
So…. am I the only one who thought that the Dothraki would make Daenerys eat another stallion heart if she got pregnant again? and Jon would be slightly furious and uneasy with the whole thing so better tell him afterwards lol XD.  I would have draw the heart but with the new tumblr’s adult rules and some people might be a little uneasy, I figured just to black it out. Also I sprained my right wrist (I’m right-handed) the other day so I’m being very careful with it, that’s why it’s not colored in completely. 

*The man Dany is talking to is Jorah Mormot, they all look very similar when i draw them as chibi’s I know =_=….

reblog.comment:

summary:
Jon: I have a plan. It might get us all killed, but if it works it will be a totally boss story. Cool?
Sansa: no, it's...
body:
Jon: I have a plan. It might get us all killed, but if it works it will be a totally boss story. Cool?

Sansa: no, it’s not!

Arya: cool!

Sansa: no! It’s not cool!

summary: Iceland photo shoot
body:
Iceland photo shoot

So, I was thinking about the Iceland photo shoot and some people are convinced they went there just because of it but I don’t buy it.

Why bother going all the way to Iceland just because of a photoshoot? They could have done it in a studio instead.

No, I believe they were filming there and since they were already there, they decided to do the photoshoot as well. Killing two birds with one stone kind of thing, you know? It makes much more sense.

summary: I have a headcanon that Jon sings really nice, but not as good as Rhaegar but still really good.  Do you think that he can sing...
question: I have a headcanon that Jon sings really nice, but not as good as Rhaegar but still really good.  Do you think that he can sing really good or??
answer: I have a similar headcanon! My idea is that, especially in the early years, Ned dissuaded Jon from doing anything that Rhaegar liked to do, in order to make sure no one could ever connect the two or be reminded of Rhaegar through Jon. Because of this, my idea is that Jon actually has a good voice, but he’s never learned how to use it formally, and was never encouraged to sing or develop the skill.

tags: la la la la la la la
summary: The story of Sansa Stark video: Sansa about that “canon” “endgame” ship: ZERO CONTENT  Sansa about Tyrion: UGH a Lannister 3...
body:
The story of Sansa Stark video:

Sansa about that “canon” “endgame” ship: ZERO CONTENT 

Sansa about Tyrion: UGH a Lannister 3 times her age…

Sansa about LF: GROSS

Sansa about the delulu crack ship: The moment that Sansa sees Jon again is the first moment of real happiness that Sansa’s probably had on the Show.  Everything that she’s been fighting to survive for is to see her family again and to see Jon, there is just such a sense of security there and she knows that she’s safe and gonna be looked after.

Have a good day!
